title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 August 2013 - XWiki
content:

15:51 <evalica> has quit  
16:22 <polx> Hey #xwiki-ers. Can I be sure from the web.xml (that is shipped with xwiki 3.5) that any request whose path starts with /xwiki/skins/ is served by the default servlet (which serves the matching file)?  
16:25 <sburjan`> has quit  
17:04 <camil7> I do not think so  
17:04 <camil7> the/xwiki/skin/ is dragged through the com.xpn.xwiki.web.SkinAction  
17:04 <camil7> you can see this in the WEB-INF/struts-config.xml  
17:05 <camil7> this does some "magic", e.g. serving attachments in the XWiki.DefaultSkin as if they are in the skins/<baseskin> directory  
17:06 <camil7> well, something loosely like that, I am no skin expert ...  
17:32 <polx> thx @camil7.  
17:42 <polx> camil7: you sure that this is not /bin/skin?  
17:43 <camil7> no, not really ... I am no xwiki expert, just a user hanging out here  
17:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:52 <vmassol> has quit  
17:59 <camil7> polx: ah, me bad, Struts stuff really applies to /bin/skin instead, so /skin should be served straight away  
18:01 <Enygma`> has quit

18:03 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
18:25 <Enygma`> has quit

18:56 <camil7> has quit  
18:59 <polx> Cool. We'll do a round of testing just to make sure.
